name: Discape
description:
Disclaimer:
- Loading of the HTML build might take a while
- The rules screen works, it shows the rules for elements on the screen so it will and should be empty on the first level

Controls:

KeyboardMouse / TouchGamepadMoveWASD/ArrowsSlide (anywhere)Left Stick / DPadSwitch DiceQ/E/TabClick on diceLB/RB  /  L1/R2Dice layoutShiftClick (anywhere)Y / TriangleShow rulesR-A / X (Playstation)

Goal:
The goal of the game is to get to the exit with any of your dice. While doing so you have to use or avoid elements such as spikes or explosives.

Debug:
You can change levels using keys "O" and "P".
